summary: Completed comprehensive testing of betting predictor app with auto-recommendations. All key features working correctly including API usage tracking, sportsbook filtering, decimal odds format, and auto-generated AI predictions.

minor_issues.issue: Timeout after 60 seconds during AI recommendation generation
minor_issues.impact: Auto-generation works but takes longer than expected

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for POST requests
minor_issues.impact: Functional but incorrect HTTP status code

passed_tests: API usage endpoint returns requests_remaining (217 calls left)
Sidebar displays API status and calls left counter correctly
Dashboard shows auto-generated Top Picks with confidence levels
Only active sportsbooks displayed (DraftKings, FanDuel, BetMGM, Pinnacle, Unibet, Betway, BetOnline)
No bet365 or Caesars sportsbooks present in odds
Decimal odds format used throughout application
AI analysis automatically saved with predictions (13 predictions found)
Events page shows 8 events with proper odds
Odds comparison page displays all active sportsbooks with best odds highlighted
Line movement tracking working with 500 data points
success_percentage: Backend: 91.7% (22/24 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all features working)
